parts.speaker: Hazel
parts.text: I can't believe it. After I specifically asked you to stay with Rudy, you didn't even come home with her last night. You left her all alone, didn't you?

options.text: I had other plans, Hazel. It was unexpected, and I got caught up in something else.
I am deeply sorry, Hazel. I don't know where my head was last night. It was a mistake, and I feel terrible about it.

parts.speaker: Hazel
parts.text: More important than our daughter? What could possibly be more important than her? Than our family?

parts.speaker: Hazel
parts.text: I understand that mistakes happen, but Rudy's trust in us is paramount. I need to be able to trust you...

options.text: Something came up at work, Hazel. It was unexpected and I had to stay longer. I'm sorry I didn't communicate it to you earlier.
I ended up hanging out with my secretary. I realize now it wasn't the best decision, especially after promising to spend time with Rudy. I'm truly sorry.
I went out with my secretary. Frankly, it's none of your business.

parts.speaker: Hazel
parts.text: You shouldn't prioritize work before family.

parts.speaker: Hazel
parts.text: I don't even want to ask. I hope you learned something.
